title: travelplanner: Could you help create a 7-day travel plan for a group of 3, departing from Greensboro and touring 3 different cities in Georgia from March 10th to March 16th, 2022? We have a new budget of $4,000 for this trip. We'd also appreciate if our accommodations have smoking areas. (b67c8b82a8e6889c)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan!

chat_history.name: flight_search

chat_history.content:
## Day 1
- 16:58 - Depart Greensboro on Delta flight F3499011.
- 18:16 - Arrive in Atlanta.

### Atlanta
- Visit the Georgia Aquarium, the world's largest aquarium. Explore the various galleries, including the Ocean Voyager gallery, which features a massive viewing window for a unique underwater experience.
- Head to the Martin Luther King Jr. National Historical Park. Follow the footsteps of Dr. King through exhibits and a tour of his childhood home.
- Enjoy an evening stroll in Piedmont Park, a green oasis in the city.

## Day 2
- Discover the Atlanta Botanical Garden, a lush paradise with themed gardens and stunning floral displays.
- Visit the National Center for Civil and Human Rights. Learn about the history and ongoing struggles for civil rights and human rights worldwide through interactive exhibits.

### Travel to Savannah
- In the afternoon, take a 4-hour drive to Savannah, a charming coastal city.

## Day 3
- Begin your day at Forsyth Park, a picturesque green space with a beautiful fountain and a great spot for morning exercise or a leisurely walk.
- Explore the Savannah Historic District. Take a walking tour to learn about the city's rich history and admire the beautiful architecture, including the iconic Forsyth Park Fountain and the Cathedral of St. John the Baptist.
- In the evening, enjoy dinner at The Olde Pink House, a historic restaurant serving Southern cuisine in a charming atmosphere.

## Day 4
- Visit the Savannah History Museum. Explore the city's past through interactive exhibits and artefacts.
- Head to River Street, a lively area along the Savannah River with shops, restaurants, and beautiful views. Enjoy a riverboat cruise for a unique perspective of the city.

### Travel to Augusta
- After a morning in Savannah, embark on a 2.5-hour drive to Augusta.

## Day 5
- Discover the Augusta Museum of History. Learn about the region's history, including the Masters Tournament's impact on the city.
- Explore the Augusta Riverwalk. Enjoy a scenic stroll along the Savannah River, with stops at various monuments and sculptures.
- In the evening, visit the Boyhood Home of President Woodrow Wilson, a historic house museum that offers a glimpse into the life of the 28th US President.

## Day 6
- Visit the Phinizy Swamp Nature Park, a natural oasis with boardwalks, wildlife, and beautiful wetlands.
- Explore the Morris Museum of Art, the first museum dedicated to the art and artists of the American South.

## Day 7
- Return to Greensboro:
   - Option 1: Flight from Augusta to Charlotte, then Charlotte to Greensboro (total journey time: 2 hours 50 minutes).
   - Option 2: Direct flight from Augusta to Greensboro (journey time: 1 hour 30 minutes).

Your trip will cost $144 per person for the flight from Greensboro to Atlanta. I was unable to find any information about the cost of the other flights, or the accommodation.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
